OOC: I wish I could be respected, but that will never happen because people=
 take one look at me and hate my guts.

Oh, and no offense on this one, but=
 damn man, I'm both the smartest and dumbest person to ever grace this RPG.=
 Fear the double identity.

I replied to this because I wanted to...

  ---=
-- Original Message -----
  From: Nic
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: =
Tuesday, September 17, 2002 10:32 AM
  Subject: Respect, for the game's sak=
e!


  All right, I've had enough of this.

  I'm tired of people taking sh=
ots at others when they know they'll get 
  a reaction. What's more, they t=
ake it at Kyle, and that means you've 
  got about a week's worth of oocs c=
oming after. Mark my words: NO ONE 
  IS MORE STUPID THAN ANYONE ELSE HERE.=

  Another thing: personnal beliefs. I don't care about the religious or 
 =
 sexual orientation. For all I know, ANYONE in this rpg could be gay 
  and=
 that WOULD CHANGE NOTHING. You're not a better person because 
  you're ga=
y or not or christian or not. That means nothing.
  We have an expression i=
n Quebec that can be translated as "Farting 
  higher than where the hole i=
s". It means taking yourself for someone 
  you are not. I don't want that =
here. I'm not asking everyone to be 
  friend with everyone, just to be res=
pectful of them.

  I just want people to realize that being mean for nothi=
ng gives 
  nothing. That's the kind of attitude that gets the war going in=
 Israel 
  and palestine. And I assure, I will personnally moderate anyone =
who 
  intentionnally insults someone for an undetermined period of time.

=

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT
               =
 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Ter=
ms of Service.
